In Ergo there is no gamesmaster, the players get on just fine on their own. They collaborate and co-operate. There is no adversarial gamesmaster whose evil plans need to be thwarted and adventures need to be beaten. Ergo does not have its own rule set. The concepts and mechanisms can be used with any set of role-playing rules. Some rule systems will be easier to use without a gamesmaster than others. Ergo was written with a modified version of the FUDGE role-playing rules in mind.

rpgissuearticle.120968: "Oste della malora"! Viaggio alla scoperta della cucina medievale

161343.name: Heirs to Hell
161343.description:
From the back of the book:

When an angel Falls,
she defects to the human race,
and takes on everything
that comes with that choice.

All of the joy
and heartbreak
of humanity are hers,
and that includes family.

Heirs to Hell discusses the children of the Unchained and presents system and setting information for including these demon-blooded in your chronicles. Some demon-blooded are completely unaware of their heritage, and some are very much inheritors of their demonic parents' power. But the God-Machine has plans for all of them.

161344.name: England Football Stars Limited Edition Monopoly
161344.description: The World Cup is around the corner and stakes are high for England. Take on this limited edition and place your bids for the best players and venues from all over Britain. From our biggest stars, such as Joe Hart or Frank Lampard, to heroes from England's illustrious past, like Gary Lineker or David Beckham.

161347.name: The Ostheomancer: A Dungeon World Playbook
161347.description:
From publisher blurb:

The thugs surrounded the man and start smiling.

"You better give us all ya monies, scum, or we'll carve ya up good" shouted the leader of this ragged mess of men.

"Run away now and I'll spare your life", answered the hooded man.

"You have no weapons, shut up! Boys, kill this arrogant pri-" started shouting the leader, just one second before his throat crunched with an horrible noise.

A huge sword slowly start appearing... from inside the man's abdomen. A huge, messy bone sword.

"You should have gone while you could."

This playbook let you play an Ostheomancer, a master of bones, flesh and blood transmutation. A weird hybrid of magic and physical prowess, this isn't a class for the weak of stomach.

This is a playbook for Dungeon World.

161348.name: Dangerous Space Jail
161348.description:
From publisher blurb:

Danger Floats Above!

After a successful adventure in the Goblin Badlands, the heroes retire to the town of Meridor to rest and recreate. That plan falls apart when the heroes are roused out of bed in the wee hours of the morning by the Mayor. A floating fortress has appeared over the town square, the likes of which have never been seen before. The fortress is motionless, save for the curls of black smoke rising off of the battlements. There are faint sounds of battle coming from above. Why is it here? What is its purpose? What is inside? The townsfolk are scared, and the Mayor needs someone to find out what is going on. There will be time later for ale and merriment, because the Dangerous Space Jail awaits.

Dangerous Space Jail is a Dungeon World adventure for 2-5 players. It was designed to be run as a one-shot adventure or as part of a campaign. The adventure utilizes unique mechanics to simulate a race against time. In addition there is ample advice to help GMs run as written or hack the adventure to their own style of play.

161349.name: Sand and Stone
161349.description:
From publisher blurb:

Since the colonization of Morden, Hebron and Hyphrates shared an enmity. In part, this was because of their nearness and competition for many resources. Their cultural differences, however, served to intensify the division as well. Hebronites are generally far more devoted to family, while Hyphratians tend to embrace personal goals. These differences often triggered misunderstandings and hostilities between the two cultures, leading to an endless series of conflicts. Much of this was swept aside in the face of the Grand Coven, when all the nations of Morden cooperated under the banner of the Armies of Light.

Sand and Stone provides additional information about the nations of Hebron and Hyphrates within Accursed's setting of Morden. It includes a broad range of different adventure hooks for GMs and players looking to explore these specific regions. It also introduces three new banes as well as Hindrances and Edges specific to these cultures.

Accursed provides additional details about the setting used in this scenario, and is required to fully make use of the game mechanics presented. Savage Worlds and the Savage Worlds Horror Companion are also required.

This PDF uses layers for ease of printing.

161350.name: Deephearth
161350.description:
From publisher blurb:

Where the waves of the Endless Sea lazily roll into a rocky inlet lies the small svirfneblin fishing village of Deephearth. Hidden in a seldom used tunnel network, the svirfneblins of Deephearth lead quiet lives unnoticed by the many lurking dangers of the Ebon Realm. Recently an earthquake blocked the mouth of the inlet where Deephearth is sitting, but the village itself escaped the event damaged. However, lately svirfneblins have gone missing. At first fishing boats disappeared without a trace, but now even villagers have disappeared from their own beds! The villagers look to their leaders for guidance, but the council is unable to act, as one of their own is among the missing.

Subterranean Enclaves are short, richly detailed supplements that each present a single subterranean settlement ready to insert into almost any home campaign. Perfect for use as a waystop on the road to adventure or as an adventure site themselves, Subterranean Enclaves present the details so the busy GM can focus on crafting exciting, compelling adventures.

This product is a Dual Format PDF. The downloadable ZIP file contains two versions, one optimised for printing and use on a normal computer and one optimised for use on a mobile device such as an iPad.

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

161351.name: Playing the Game
161351.description:
From publisher blurb:

"THE GAME SHALL NOW, TRULY, BEGIN..."

What dirty peasant hasn't wanted to turn his grubby copper into a shiny gold coin? The oddly-dressed stranger offered a friendly game, a tempting wager, what was the harm? But harm is definitely in the air when a pack of rubes stumble upon an extradimensional test of elemental loyalty! Can you make it through the tests of skill, arms and wits to achieve the Ultimate Prize?

Get Playing the Game from Purple Duck Games, an unorthodox 0th level 'funnel' for 16-20 0-level Dungeon Crawl Classics players, in that popular RPG from Goodman Games! Includes:

A 0th level 'funnel' adventure, scalable for play at any level of DCC
Full-sized map/gameboard
Rules for the fascinating board game 'Arbakampsi'
Three new Patrons and their accompanying spell rules and reasons for being part of an exciting DCC campaign.

161352.name: Classes of the Sword and Song Adventuring Guild
161352.description:
From publisher blurb:

Explore the exotic, powerful, and unique character options encountered during the many adventures of the Sword and Song Adventuring Guild!

Classes of the Sword and Song Adventuring Guild introduces two new class options compatible with the 3.5 revision of the d20 System:

Master and shape the magical energies of the universe with the awe-inspiring Channeler! Bend the elements to your will and control the fundamental forces of reality itself!
Or discover the playful and adventurous Fey Trickster! Utilizing the wild magic inside themselves, the descendants of the fey can learn to use magic items beyond all limits!

161353.name: The Devotees
161353.description:
From the back of the book:

The Devotees is a scenario for Eclipse Phase:

Pit your Firewall team against Nine Lives, the most ruthless syndicate of soul thieves in the System.
Investigate a horrifying new psychosurgery technique that creates worshipful slaves.
Includes new information on the organization and key figures in the Nine Lives crime syndicate.
Includes details about Legba, Nine Lives’ asteroid stronghold in the Main Belt.
Includes hooks for future adventures against Nine Lives

161354.name: The Brotherhood of the Fallen
161354.description:
From publisher blurb:

Over a century ago, the vile ‘Brotherhood of the Fallen’ unleashed a horrifying reign of terror upon the town of Redvale. Yet while the cult was ultimately vanquished by the legendary hero, Alexander Winterlight, the deep mental and physical scars which Redvale’s people suffered at the hands of the Brotherhood remained. For years, the town’s citizens lived with the constant fear that the Brotherhood may one day return to plague Redvale once more, but over the ensuing decades, memory of the atrocities which the cult perpetrated began to fade. This all changed but a few short months ago… when the Brotherhood’s lost temple was seemingly uncovered in a nearby mountain range, a discovery that threatened to shatter the peace and serenity which the people of Redvale had enjoyed of late.

Since the temple’s seeming discovery, a number of strange events have occurred in and around Redvale, events that have led the people of the town to wonder if the Brotherhood has truly returned, or if there could perhaps be some other sinister force at work within their midst? If only Redvale’s council could find a group of brave (or perhaps foolhardy) souls who would be willing to step forth and pit themselves against the menace that is… The Brotherhood of the Fallen!!!

The Brotherhood of the Fallen is an adventure designed for characters of 1st to 3rd level. Yet those who are brave enough to pit their wits against the Brotherhood will need far more than a strong sword arm, as intrigue abounds within the town of Redvale, while all manner of fiendish traps and puzzles lie within the cult’s temple. So ask yourself this; are you truly ready to face the dangers which lie within?!

The Brotherhood of the Fallen contains a 38-page Introduction Book and a 109-page Adventure Book, along with numerous maps and player handouts.

161355.name: Rise of the Replicants
161355.description:
From publisher blurb:

Rise of the Replicants is a module created for the Marvel Super-Heroes Role-Playing game. The module's Adventure Book is 106-pages long and focuses on original characters, although it was written in such a way that it can be used with original characters of your own making.

161356.name: Priest Base Class
161356.description:
From publisher blurb:

One of the most iconic archetypes of fantasy RPGs is the robed (un)holy diviner. This type of character uses divine power to evoke power ranging from healing to necromancy to buffing to debuffing to even blasting.

However, in the tabletop world, the only divine characters ever seen are fully equipped in heavy armor and a blunt weapon for whacking. These religious zealots focus on buffing themselves to most effective bash their foes.

Flaming Crab Games presents the Priest Base Class!

At first glance, the Priest appears more like a wizard donned with holy symbols than a typical diviner in Pathfinder. It's a d6, 1/2 BAB divine class equipped to fill in the role of a full divine caster that's most effective WITHOUT the warrior's attire.

How? The Priest gains domain-like Dogmas that grant spells from the wizard and cleric spell lists that have more cloth-caster appropriate spells than the domain list. The priest chooses 3 (sub)dogmas among a list of 100+ dogmas and subdogmas. These dogmas can be spontaneously cast in the same way a cleric spontaneously casts healing spells.

Also in this book are a number of Archetypes for the Priest including the following: Fanatic, Heretic, Hospitaler, Kahuna, Necromancer, Philosopher, Sage, Undivided Priest, Wanderer, and Zealot. In addition, we included a couple cleric/priest feats: Empower Channel, Greater Channel, and Maximize Channel.

161357.name: Real Estate
161357.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Crazy Devils gang is making inroads into new turf, they made the mistake of picking the turf where the heroes live. Dragged into gang warfare not of their making the heroes must survive and fight back. The gang are fighting for the real estate, the heroes are fighting for their homes, justice and a big pile of credits.

Real Estate is a One-Sheet adventure ideal for introducing players and novice characters to Interface Zero 2.0. It can easily be adapted for any tier of heroes. It can be run on its own or lead into a more complex adventure for the heroes.

One-Sheet adventures are designed to be run with minimal prep and contain enough content for a game session or two. These adventures are also great as filler in longer campaigns, to use as a spring board for a longer adventure, or just to mix it up.

161358.name: How to Start a Campaign
161358.description:
Author Summary:

A one page setup for the initial village of a new campaign complete with simple maps, NPCs and magic items. It was a submission to the One Page Dungeon Contest 2014.

161359.name: The Sepulchre of the Clone
161359.description:
Author Summary:

A half page dungeon involving a sleeping clone of a powerful wizard on an island.

161361.name: Necessary Evil Player's Guide
161361.description:
From publisher blurb:

This Player's Guide for Necessary Evil contains the first 57 pages of the book, including all the Edges and Hindrances, rules for character creation, complete equipment lists, the setting rules, and the potent Powers list! Our Player's Guides also feature a site license that allows the GM to print and hand out a copy of this document to every player in his group!

161363.description:
Wanderers from afar bring tales of the strange and powerful in distant lands. Set out to find lost heroes, creatures, and cities as you build your kingdom in this first expansion to Eight-Minute Empire: Legends! Eight-Minute Empire: Lost Lands adds even more variety and depth to the game, including:


New "Lost" card faction with unique powers
New Heroes
Components for a fifth player and a sixth player
Double-sized island on a folded board
Player boards
Faster gameplay as players now select cards simultaneously from separate hands passed to the left each turn
161363.name: Eight-Minute Empire: Lost Lands

161365.name: Cut the Rope 2
161365.description:
Cut the Rope 2 expands on the previous games with a greater emphasis on story, additional monster characters and a more dynamic environment.

Source: Wikipedia, "Cut the Rope", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161366.name: Halo: Spartan Assault
161366.description:
Halo: Spartan Assault is a 2013 top-down third-person shooter video game developed by 343 Industries and Vanguard Entertainment.
Halo: Spartan Assault is set between the events of Halo 3 and Halo 4. Players control the human soldiers Edward Davis and Sarah Palmer as they fight the alien Covenant. The game launched with 25 single-player missions, with more content released later. In addition, the game is Xbox Live enabled and includes Achievements.

Source: Wikipedia, "Halo: Spartan Assault", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161367.name: Destroyer Escort
161367.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a little booklet of a Traveller compatible vehicle. The vehicle introduced in this installment of the series is a primitive TL4 destroyer escort.

The PDF contains the background of the vehicle and statistics for its use as well as an illustration.

161368.description:
Kickstarter Exclusive

4 Action Marker Cards. Each card is the same and the text says:
Return this card to the side of the play area to: play a follower from your hand or to draw a follower card from your deck.

At the end of your turn, return all Action cards to the side of the play area.

Note: these cards do not give you an additional ability but rather provide a physical way of tracking actions
161368.name: Crimson Sun: Action Marker Cards

161369.name: Night Demons
161369.description:
From publisher blurb:

A diplomatic mission leads to the discovery that the menace of the cannibal P’jahks has spread through the land! The heroes will risk being caught between a mysterious outcast and an arrogant young chief. Will they strengthen an old treaty, or start a war with their meddling? An exciting Paleolithic adventure for a group of caveman characters with a total combat strength of 8.5. Bonus: Random Yorwa Name Tables! Bonus 2: Wolf Paper Minis!

161370.description:
Kickstarter Exclusive

4 cards. Includes:
Anubis Rising
Ascension of Thoth
Sobek's Call
Army of Khnum

Each card may be played (flipped face down) during the assemble step and allows you to play one card of the respective god for no cost.
If played, the card is flipped face up at the beginning of the player's concentrate step

Note: these cards do not give you an additional ability but rather provide a physical way of tracking if a player uses his God assemble ability
161370.name: Lords of the Sand: God Assembly Ability Marker Cards

161371.name: Savant - Ascent
161371.description:
A malicious orb has cast Savant out of his tower and transformed his surroundings into dangerous enemies!

Dodge and shoot your way back up the tower, and blast down waves of enemies as you make your way towards the top! As you progress, you unlock CDs that not only give you new tracks to play to, but also grant you powerful new abilities!

Can you make it to the top?

Source: The Game Website.

161372.name: Here Be Monsters
161372.description:
From publisher blurb:

Kor pulled his fur cloak tighter around him as he stepped further into the icy chamber. Torchlight reflected off patches of ice and mounds of snow and with each exhale his breath formed trailers of mist that drifted toward the icicle-studded ceiling. The air was still and nothing moved. Then a faint rustling and a crack ice came from his right. Kor drew his sword and turned to face the source of the noise. A mound of ice and snow ten feet away was shifting and flowing into a higher mound. As he watched, the mound began to take the shape of a monstrous reptile.

Welcome to the premier issue of Across the Realms: Encyclopedia of Adventure! Across the Realms: Encyclopedia of Adventure is a new series from New Realms Publishing dedicated to bringing you new material for your tabletop games. This first issue brings you thirteen new monsters for your fantasy adventure games. Each creature entry includes a complete description, statistics and special abilities. Written for Labyrinth Lord, the monsters can easily be adapted for use in most Old School RPG’s.

161373.name: Helm of the Nightrazer
161373.description:
From publisher blurb:

Legends abound about an ancient helmet worn by warriors, adventurers, bandits and barbarians. The helm is said to be enchanted, but on the exact powers few can agree. Many have gone in search of it, but it has yet to be found. Will you go in search of this legendary item and be the next to bear the Helm of the Nightrazer?

Helm of the Nightrazer is the first in the Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items series from New Realms Publishing. Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items brings you new enchanted objects for your fantasy adventure games. Suitable for any fantasy roleplaying game and stated for Old School games, each edition of Artifacts and Items includes the description and history of the item, abilities, rumors and adventure hooks. Entice the characters with rumors and legends of new items, design new adventures and expand your campaigns with Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items.

161374.name: Doomrak the Ogre Crusher
161374.description:
From publisher blurb:

Crafted by dwarves and wielded by barbarian chiefs and heroes, the hammer, Doomrak the Ogre Crusher, is said to bring fortune to the wielder and doom to his enemies. The hammer was lost, though, and lies in a place where only the bravest dare tread. Will you be the next to wield this legendary hammer, or will you fall among the bones of those that came before?

Doomrak the Ogre Crusher is the second in the Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items series from New Realms Publishing. Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items brings you new enchanted objects for your fantasy adventure games. Suitable for any fantasy roleplaying game and stated for Old School games, each edition of Artifacts and Items includes the description and history of the item, abilities, rumors and adventure hooks. Entice the characters with rumors and legends of new items, design new adventures and expand your campaigns with Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items.

161375.name: The Bracers of Barakus
161375.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fashioned long ago by the famous alchemist and enchanter, Atolicus, for Barakus, the legendary swordsman and sorcerer, the Bracers of Barakus are said to impart on the wearer many magical powers. Like many legendary items, though, what became of the bracers is not known. Some say they were worn by a master thief and lost in a tomb or that they were stolen from an enchanter. Others claim that a goblin now wears them and is using their powers to gather an army. Whatever the case, if you wish to wear the bracers, you’ll have discover the truth, first.

The Bracers of Barakus is a complete and free release from the Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items series from New Realms Publishing. Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items brings you new enchanted objects for your fantasy adventure games. Suitable for any fantasy roleplaying game and stated for Old School games, each edition of Artifacts and Items includes the description and history of the item, abilities, rumors and adventure hooks. Entice the characters with rumors and legends of new items, design new adventures and expand your campaigns with Across the Realms: Artifacts and Items.

161376.name: Book of Tables #1
161376.description:
From publisher blurb:

Does your dungeon need details?

Are you stuck for ideas?

Don’t know if there’s anything unusual about the statue or what happens if they open the sarcophagus?

Want to add something different to your adventures?

Did the PCs do something unexpected, again?

Open up Across the Realms: Book of Tables and roll up some results!

Across the Realms: Book of Tables #1 is a collection of tables for your fantasy adventuring needs. With Across the Realms: Book of Tables #1, you can determine the descriptions of dungeon corridors and rooms, unusual features, what can be found on the remains of fallen adventurers and more! Suitable for any fantasy RPG, Across the Realms: Book of Tables #1 includes 32 tables with hundreds of possible results. Fill in details of your dungeon, determine what happens when the characters step through a misty archway, search the statue of a wizard, open a newly discovered chest and more! Bookmarked and with a linked table of contents, Across the Realms: Book of Tables is fast and simple to use and a great addition to your fantasy adventuring games. With Across the Realms: Book of Tables you never need to be stuck for ideas or caught unprepared again!

161377.name: The AnalogXP (Issue 1 - Jun 2014)
161377.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this issue:

The Gaming Lab! Earlier this year we hosted a great event here in Brazil focused on analog game design discussion. Creators from all around came to showcase their projects, ideas, theories. The Laboratório de Jogos was a great success, and I hope next year we'll be able to bring more international guests!
Patronage in Brazil! Find out who is already using this amazing platform in Portuguese language. A lot of new projects coming all around and now we're finally trying to translate everything to English!
Caduceus! Every issue of the Analog XP will contain a fully translated game and this month we have Caduceus, a two player futuristic game about using another body as a vessel for your brain to infiltrate a living fortress. This was the first game of the Patreon Versus to be voted as the best game yet.

161378.name: Slender: The Arrival
161378.description:
The majority of the game takes place in abandoned areas (house, defunct mine, etc.), each with different objectives. Slender: The Arrival uses similar mechanics to its predecessor, The Eight Pages. The character is armed only with a flashlight. This limited defense forces a sense of helplessness, as the best way to survive in the game is to run whenever in danger.

Source: Wikipedia, "Slender: The Arrival," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161379.name: Crypts & Creatures
161379.description:
From publisher blurb:


Let the Adventure Begin!!

Crypts & Creatures was designed as an easy-to-learn trimmed-down version of the most popular fantasy RPG. C&C can be used to introduce absolutely new players to role playing games using easy-to-learn rules that provide a smooth transition into the larger more complicated games. C&C can also be played by experts and experienced players as quick-fun/experimental games.

Have you ever wanted to run an experimental or quick game? Ancient Greek setting with the players as demi-gods? Evil campaign with the forces of Good and the agents (Paladins)of the God of Light everywhere? An all one-class campaign: The Thieves' Guild, Master Everrhas's Wizards College? All of this can be done with Crypts & Creatures! Live the Adventure!

Easy for GM's to adapt to and players to learn.
Simple system based from the SRD.
Only 17 pages of rules.
Adaptable, most supplements (generic or mainstream) can be added with little or no conversion.

161380.name: Crypts & Creatures Psionics Handbook
161380.description:
From publisher blurb:


Behold! The powers of the mind!

Psionics is the ultimate equalizer when handling supernatural powers. Some say that it rivals magic! No more bulky spellbooks, strange arcane components or obscure incantations. Psionic powers reside in the mind, just waiting for the right manifester to come forward and claim their prize; whether it's the Psion – with their six specialty Disciplines, Psychic Warriors – the perfect mix of metal and mind, or Wilders – with powerful Wild Surges.

Five psionic races
Three psionic classes
New Skill (Concentration)
Psicrystals (psionic familiars)
Psionic Powers & Items
12 Psionic Monsters

161381.name: Crypts & Creatures Dungeon Adventures: Book I
161381.description:
From publisher blurb:


Let the Adventure Begin!!

Welcome to the first of many published dungeons for the Crypts & Creatures RPG. While these were designed for C&C, they can be modified for other 20-sided dice-based RPGs. The dungeons themselves are storyless as they were designed to help the GM with the dungeon aspect of their campaign without interfering with any existing story elements.

The Halls of Horror: 4 characters of levels 2-4
The Sanctum of Shiva the Destroyer: 4 characters of levels 4-6
The Crypt of Crimson Death: 4-5 characters of levels 9-11
GM maps and separate player maps included.

161382.name: Crypts & Creatures Dungeon Adventures: Book Two
161382.description:
From publisher blurb:


Let the Adventure Begin!!

Welcome back, we are proud to present the second installment of published dungeons for the Crypts & Creatures RPG. While these were designed for C&C, they can be modified for other 20-sided dice-based RPGs. The dungeons themselves are storyless as they were designed to help the GM with the dungeon aspect of their campaign without interfering with any existing story elements.

Krolas's Keep: 3-4 characters of levels 2-4 (Theme: Mixed)
The Tower of Thought: 3-4 characters of levels 4-6 (Theme: Psionic)
The Unholy Tombs: 4-5 characters of levels 9-11 (Theme: Abyssal/Demonic)
GM maps and separate player maps included.

161383.name: LIE
161383.description:
Players begin the game with 5 cards and they choose which number on each card they will use to bluff and win the round. During a round, each player must either make a bid of how many of a certain die they believe are shared amongst all players chosen dice -OR- call the previous player's bluff and say, "LIE!" The loser of the round may only draw back up to 4 cards next round and play continues until just one player remains!

There are several unique aspects to this 30-card mini micro game:

1. Players choose which dice they will bid and bluff with each round.
2. Each player holds extra hidden information based on which dice they DIDN'T use for the round.
3. The first player to bid in a round must choose which direction the bidding will proceed in.
4. 2 to 6 Players can play!
5. Several variants included.

161384.name: Ironclad Tactics: The Rise of Dmitry
161384.description:
Explore the untold backstory of Dmitry in Ironclad Tactics' first add-on campaign, Ironclad Tactics: The Rise of Dmitry. With eight new missions, including the six-stage "Fort Phantom Ridge" gauntlet mission, you'll unlock up to eighteen new cards, including Dmitry's fearsome army of transforming ironclads!

Source: The Publisher Website.

161385.name: Blood of the Werewolf
161385.description:
User Summary

Blood of the Werewolf has two different styles of game-play, human and werewolf; each mode has its own controls and special abilities. Selena is a loving mother, devoted wife, and powerful werewolf. She seeks revenge on the monsters that slew her husband and stole her child. She has a crossbow when in human form and can transform instantaneously to her werewolf form.

161386.name: Ironclad Tactics: Blood and Ironclads
161386.description:
The steam-powered automatons of the American Civil War make their way to Europe in Ironclad Tactics: Blood and Ironclads, an exciting new add-on campaign for the fast-paced, card-based tactics game Ironclad Tactics. With eight new missions, two new full-sized armies, and a challenging WAR! mode, you'll unlock up to twenty four new cards from the French and German Empires!

Source: The Publisher Website.

161390.name: Tears to Tiara
161390.description:
The game draws heavily from Welsh, Celt, Christian and Roman mythology, with characters named Arawn, Arthur, Epona, Llŷr, Morgan, Pwyll, Rhiannon, and Taliesin. It has heavy adult themes but a censored version called Tears to Tiara: Garland of the Earth was released.

Source: Wikipedia, "Tears to Tiara," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161391.name: Tears to Tiara II: Heir of the Overlord
161391.description:
User Summary

Tears to Tiara II is a grid based strategy with mounts you can ride. The story focuses on two new protagonists and follows Hamil, the last survivor from the royal family and Tart, a goddess that resides over war and comes from another world.

161392.description:
From inside the game: "At last the grand old Army game of shooting dice (craps) has been lifted into respectability- to be enjoyed often when friends meet."

Checker Dice consists of 126 cards (the game calls them "checkers") numbered from 2 to 12. The cards have pictures of die rolls, but the frequency of the numbers does not quite match the statistical likelihood of rolling those numbers on 2D6. For example, there are equal numbers of sixes, sevens, and eights.

To play, players turn over cards and hope to get certain numbers and avoid others, just as in Craps. Once a card is turned over, it remains face up for the remainder the player's turn, which slightly affects the statistical probability of finding another card with the same number.
161392.name: Checker Dice

161393.name: Scania Truck Driving Simulator
161393.description:
Get behind the wheel of one of the most iconic trucks on the road with this highly detailed Scania R-series simulation. Simulation reality is pushed to the extreme, in this unique mix of video game and simulation, designed to have mass appeal to anyone who loves trucking!

The simulation features a beautifully 3D rendered truck, complete with highly detailed dashboard, instruments and exceptional physics that bring the simulation to life.

Put your driving skills to the ultimate test with 10 individual truck maneuvering challenges that serve as a practical exam as you strive to gain your licence. Complete intricately designed courses and tasks, in realistic environments that put you firmly into the driver's seat. Can you avoid obstacles whilst reversing a trailer? Do you have the lateral thinking required to find your way through a complex obstacle track? Can you park with precision? Once you have mastered the basics and gained your licence, compete against the best as you take part in a dozen disciplines inspired by the Young European Truck Driver competition - the virtual re-creation of Scania Driver Competition events. Learn the tricks to navigate your truck with centimetre precision!

If that is not enough, experience the drive of your life, with a series of ten ultimate challenges that put man and machine to the test. From mountain roads, to bad weather, to blocked routes, you will need to work in perfect harmony with your Scania truck to reach your destination safely.

Drive through in a series of freeform missions, that has you delivering the goods around a huge, intricately detailed 3D city. Pick the loads that appeal to you as you ferry freight with complete freedom!

Take the opportunity to learn more about the world leading Scania trucks with a unique opportunity for a virtual visit to Scania's own Demo Centre - the very place where Scania shows off its vehicles to VIP guests!

Full Internet connectivity allows you upload your high scores and download the best result charts to see how you rank against the experts. Study the techniques used by the masters in downloadable re-plays that both teach and inspire virtual Scania drivers!

When you want to take a short break from the wheel, what better than a visit to the virtual gallery. A must-have for any Scania truck fan: feast your eyes on a vast gallery of Scania vehicles photos and videos. Check out highlights from previous seasons Young European Truck Driver competition to whet your appetite as you strive to match the performances of the true masters of trucking.

Hit the road in this superlative Scania simulation that will guarantee you want to keep on trucking!

Source: Game Website.

161394.name: Trucks & Trailers
161394.description:
Put your Truck driving skills to the test in Trucks & Trailers! Complete basic training and set on the way to master the wide variety of challenges that lie ahead.

Manoeuvring these huge vehicles is not easy especially when you are up against the clock. Make sure you deliver those valuable goods in pristine condition - your reputation depends on it!

Source: The Game Website.

161395.name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Going East!
161395.description:
Going East! add-on expands the original Euro Truck Simulator 2 map with new destinations for cargo delivery across Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, and Hungary.

Additional 20+ hours of driving to explore all the new areas in the game world.

13 new cities including Warsaw, Krakow, Ostrava, Budapest, Kosice and more.

Source: The Game Website.

161396.name: Among the Sleep

videogamehonor.36308: 2016 Emotional Games Best Indie Game Nominee

161396.description:
In Among the Sleep you take on the role of a two year old child. You have yet to develop a full sense of reality, making you weak and susceptible to the horrifying creatures inhabiting your nightmares.
One particular night a dramatic event occurs, forcing you to flee from your home and enter a surreal world. Only accompanied by Teddy, you must overcome many hardships to find a way to safety.

Source: The Game Developer Website.

161401.name: Paper Saga
161401.description:
Enter the enchanted kingdom of Papyrum, where you are the author of your very own storybook adventure! Once upon a time and not too long ago, Papyrum was a land of enchantment and beauty until a dark and dreary cloud was cast upon the kingdom by the Evil Witch, Teyra. All that remains is the withered Tree of Life and it’s Guardian, Syl the Owl. As the keeper of the Magic Book, you hold the keys to restore Papyrum to its former beauty and return power back to the King, Queen, and Princess Braithlin.

Source: The Developer Website.

161402.name: Mundial Goal
161402.description:
A Trivial game about soccer and soccer-players. During your turn you have to draw 3 soccer-player counters from a draw pile of 72 and order them according to a random trait that could be: age, height, caps in the national team, caps in mundial, goal in the national team and goal in mundial.

Other players have to agree or disagrre to your decision.

All the players have also bet counter to use during the game.

161404.name: Santa's Village
161404.description:
The Holiday game that everyone has been talking about! Santa's Village is the perfect game for the whole family. Help Santa by building a bigger and better village, and save Christmas from being ruined by the Grumpkins!

Start by building homes for the elves in Santa's Village, create a toy factory and make lots of toys, teach reindeer how to fly, and meet magical neighbors like Yobo the Yeti. Unlock special buildings and colorful decorations to make your village even merrier.

Check out the cool 3D zoom graphics with the ability to see your village and all your buildings with a 360° wrap-around view!

Source: The Developer Website.

161405.name: Hidden Haunts
161405.description:
A peaceful town has fallen under a terrible curse. Its people have disappeared and only their souls remain as ghosts. As a novice detective, you must solve the Hauntings of Lost Haven. Unlock your sixth sense in this stunning hidden objects game and help lift the town’s curse.

Solve supernatural cases, find hidden objects in stunning photographic scenes, build a mysterious village, and compete with your friends.

Available for FREE on Facebook

Source: The Developer Website.

161406.name: Hidden Express
161406.description:
It’s a hidden object game like you’ve never played before! Explore gorgeous photographic scenes in search of lost objects. Can you find them all before the clue train gets away? With dozens of locations to explore and fast, fun gameplay, this is one ride you won’t want to miss!

Source: The Developer Website.

161407.name: Knights of Arthur: A Game of Knightly Adventure in the Age of King Arthur.
161407.description:
BACKGROUND: Kinghts of Arthur is an adventure game where the players assume the role of a Heroic Knights in the age of King Arthur. The Player Knights are young, eager Knights anxious to prove themselves in order to become a Knight of the Round Table. In order to accomplish this, the Player Knights must seek out adventures and quests to improve their attributes and receive a grant from King Arthur to join the Knights of the Round Table.

Game-Play
Each Player creates their own Player Knight Character composed of the following Attributes: Virtue, Resolve, Chivalry, Stamina, Combat and Defense. Each Player Knight takes their turn individually, using a Player-Knight Counter to represent themselves on the Map. Each Player's Turn consists of the following actions:
SEQUENCE OF PLAY
1. Move, Heal wounds or Stay Put. Party may move, Heal or remain in the current location.
2. Encounter Check: Roll on the Encounter Table for each area entered to determine if an Encounter occurs.
3. Resolve Encounter. If an Encounter occurs, roll on the Reaction Chart to determine the Encounter’s reaction. Resolve the Encounter to conclusion, including combat.
4. Conduct Knightly Action: The Player Knight may conduct one of the following Actions: Enter Town/Castle, Shop, Seek Entry to a Castle,Resolve Quest, Acquire a Ship, and several other actions.
5. Attribute Improvement: Player Knights may Trade in earned Valor Points to Improve their Attributes.

Combat is resovled on a Battle Mat representing a Castle and surroundings. The combat system is man-to-man and has the feel of skirmish fighting, but, resolved quickly without slowing the game.

Knights of Arthur is full of Arthurian Themes from various sources, but, especially from Sir Thomas Mallory's Le Morte D'Arthur. As a Knight, you will perform many Knightly duties including completing quests, dispatching bandits and brigands, participate in battles and sieges, rescuing damsels and possibly serving them. There are Tournaments to participate in and Monsters to slay!

If you enjoy books like Le Morte D'Arthur or movies like Excalibur, you will enjoy this game.

Knights of Arthur can be found at http://www.berserkergames.net

161408.name: Crypts & Creatures Denizens of the World
161408.description:
From publisher blurb:


Let the Adventure Begin!!

Need a strong barbarian, how about a wily rogue, perhaps a dedicated yet conniving wizard? This supplement has it all. All the pre-generated characters that you'd need for your Crypts & Creatures game. This is the first of many free supplements to be released by Pick Up & Go Games for the Crypts & Creatures system.

14 pre-generated characters (one for each class)
Random character creation charts
Greater details of the Gods from the Core Book

161409.name: Mage & Minions
161409.description:
Demons, gold, and epic gear await. Go on a journey that will take you to worlds of peril and wonder. From your home world to an alien landscape and beyond

Mage and Minions is a free to play mobile action RPG that merges old-school diabolic roots with modern visuals and controls. Will you conquer or be conquered?

Fight spectacular battles using your spells and minions in immersive real-time action

Find weapons and armor to upgrade your hero's power and looks

Draw spell signs to obliterate your enemies

Recruit minions - use their unique abilities - build your perfect team

Source: The Developer Website.

161410.description:
Objective: be the first reaching space 57
- moving by turns -
simple 'Roll&Move' game; ending on a red marked space follow instructions glued into the lid.

note:
published before WWI; game theme follows the 'Max & Moritz' story from Wilhelm Busch
for more information see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilhelm_Busch
161410.name: Schulbuben-Streiche

161411.name: Districts
161411.description:
English:
The King wants to know which of his battalions is the strongest and faithful. They will be tested and the best one, will become the royal guard and will get the king's favor.

Each battalion is composed by 5 soldiers, 3 swordsman, 1 squire and 1 knight.
Each soldier has a different force value and movement, so players would need to combine them adequately in order to conquest the king's districts and capture the enemy battalions.

On each turn, player has up 3 movements to be distributed on
his soldiers. It should move at least one soldier per turn.

The king will announce 3 districts to conquest and then, the battalions will enter into the citadel to conquest it. The first one to have presence in the 3 districts will be the winner. Capturing soldiers enemies can also give the victory, as once 3 solders from a battalion are capture, they loses the conquest.

Once the winner of a conquest is declared. He take the district card and there is a new announcement. Then, a new district card is placed on the board to start a new conquest round.

The battalion that gets first 3 conquests (3 district cards), will become the king’s royal guard.

Spanish:
El Rey quiere saber cual de sus batallones es el mas fuerte y leal. Estos serán sometidos a prueba para determinar quien es el mejor, quien se convertirá en la guardia real y tendrán el favor del rey.

Cada batallón esta compuesta por 5 soldados: 3 espadachines, 1 escudero y 1 caballero.
Cada soldado tiene un valor de fuerza y movimiento diferente, por lo que los jugadores tendrán que combinarlos adecuadamente a fin de conquistar los distritos y capturar los batallones enemigos.

En cada turno, los jugadores tendrán hasta 3 movimientos para distribuir entre sus soldados. Deberá mover al menos 1 soldado una vez.

El rey anunciará 3 distritos para conquistar y es cuando los batallones entraran en la ciudadela para conquistarlo. El primero en tener presencia en los 3 distritos será el ganador. Capturar soldados enemigos también podría dar la victoria, pues una vez 3 soldados de un batallón son capturados pierden la conquista.

Una vez el ganador de la conquista es declarado, el jugador guarda la carta de distrito y nuevo anuncio del rey tendrá lugar. Entonces se saca una nueva carta de distrito y comienza una nueva ronda de conquista.

El batallón que consiga primero los 3 conquistas (3 cartas de distritos) será nombrado nueva guardia real.

161412.name: Doppelkopf HD
161412.description:
User Summary

The German Card game "Doppelkopf" can be played on the road with this android-app for smart phones and tablets. It is a Card game for four Players.

161413.name: Trivio 3000 la fuerza del saber
161413.description:
Spanish 80´s clone of the popular game Trivial.

From the spanish box:

"¡Este juego contiene más de 3000 preguntas, participa y que las fuerzas del saber te acompañen!"

"This game has more than 3000 questions, play and may the forces of knowledge be with you!"

161414.name: VIENGA
161414.description:
Vienga is a deck of cards that captures and simplifies the English language. Each depicts a letter, a number, and a clearly illustrated part of speech (noun, tense, adverb...) or sentence form. The back of the card has example sentences to show how each grammar point is used.

The Vienga cards can be used to play a variety of games. Simply use the cards to create equations, or words, or sentences. Vienga can be a challenging group game or a solo learning aid. The Vienga cards help you visualize sentence structures, recombine and replace words, and develop creative thinking. Challenging for native speakers and students with a good command of English wishing to improve their language skills.

161415.name: Three Kings (Revised Edition)
161415.description:
From publisher blurb:

Wartime roleplaying…with tentacles!

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS THE REVISED & UPDATE VERSION OF THREE KINGS WHICH REQUIRES THE ACHTUNG! CTHULHU KEEPERS & INVESTIGATOR'S GUIDE

IF YOU DO NOT OWN THESE YOU CAN PURCHASE THE STAND ALONE VERSIONS OF THREE KINGS FOR CALL OF CTHULHU OR SAVAGE WORLDS

Achtung! Cthulhu brings you a two-fisted wartime CALL OF CTHULHU & SAVAGE WORLDS roleplaying game setting packed full of fiendish Nazis, terrifying ancient mysteries, legendary war machines, and enough writhing tentacles to fill ten Reichstags!

Three Kings is the first in a series of standalone adventure supplements in the globe-spanning Zero Point campaign for Achtung! Cthulhu written by Sarah Newton. Join a band of heroic soldiers, agents, and partisans behind enemy lines on the eve of World War Two, as they discover the unspeakable horrors of Castle Karlstein in occupied Czechoslovakia!

Inside you will find everything you need:

A standalone multi-episode adventure for hours of play!
Maps of Europe, Czechoslovakia, Castle Karlstein, and the surrounding area
An “Operational Briefing” handout
Setting information on Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia
Packed full of inspiration artwork by Dim Martin
Four pregenerated characters to get you playing immediately!

161416.name: Tabula
161416.description:
Made entirely of wood and designed to be self-contained, Tabula is its own box. The game closes in on itself to become an sleek tabula, "tablet" in Latin. The name Tabula also comes from "Tabula Rasa", meaning "blank slate" - the board starts as a blank slate that then becomes filled with the tiles.

Tabula is a a simple turn-based strategy game in which the objective is to occupy the most spaces of the board. In this game, each player has access to four different type of special tiles that have unique abilities: Attack, Defense, Expansion, Jump. The game-play consists of playing either 1 special tile or two regular tiles (that have no abilities). The game ends when all the spaces of the board have been filled. Whoever has the most tiles is the winner.

Not only is this game a source of tremendous fun, but also is a beautiful aesthetic addition to the home.

boardgamehonor.26778: 2014 Golden Geek Best Card Game Nominee

161417.description:
The rules of "Red" are simple: highest card wins! But "Red" is just one of seven games you'll be playing in Red7, and if you're not winning the current game at the end of your turn, you're out! The last person standing wins the round.

The deck in Red7 is 49 cards: each of the colors of the rainbow numbered 1 to 7. A hand takes just a couple minutes!
161417.name: Red7

161419.description:
The King is looking for adventurers to fill his ranks of champions, an elite fighting force charged with protecting the King and doing his more “hands on” work.
In an attempt to weed out the weak from the application pool, the King conscripted the Royal Academy of Magi to construct a magical labyrinth. Loaded with deadly traps, vicious monsters and other contestants, you must live long enough to escape in order to become one of the chosen few. One of the Kings Champions!

Labyrintheus is a brand new dungeon survival card game that introduces a unique Persona Card System where you compete against you fellow party members to defeat Monsters and Avoid Traps while collecting Gate Stones. Gate Stones are used to activate the portal to the outside world.

One of the things that makes Labyrintheus unique is the persona card system. When you chose a character to play, you will have their persona card. More of a tile than a card, you use this for your inventory system and to track your health. Treasure cards collected in Labyrintheus are equipped by placing them along the appropriate edges of the persona card. And once you die, flip the persona card over to reveal your stats and abilities as an undead servant of the King. If you can't win, why should anyone else?!?
161419.name: Labyrintheus

17424.name: Greater Than Games (Dice Hate Me Games)

161420.description:
SUNDAY! SUNDAY! SUNDAY! Monster Truck Mayhem is invading the SuperMegaDome! Brought to you by Ridback Pub, 101 The Animal, and Big Al’s Sound Emporium! This thrill show spectacular will BLOW YOUR MIND! All your favorite trucks and more will be there… AND SO SHOULD YOU! Car crushing, Mud Sliding, Bus Jumping, and general mayhem for only $10! TEN BUCKS gets you the whole seat... but you will only need the edge Edge EDGE!

Race around the SuperMegaDome and be the first to cross the finish line!

Monster Truck Mayhem is a real-time dice rolling racing game. Players simultaneously roll their dice to race around the SuperMegaDome track and the winner is the first player to cross the finish line!

Players use custom dice to move 1, 2, or 3 spaces at a time. “Tire” and “Boost” are used to navigate course obstacles like the Car Crush, Bus Jump, Mud Pit, and more! Three “Boost” is an instant movement bonus. Three “Tires” causes another player to spin out!

Crush obstacles AND the competition and be the first Monster Truck to cross the finish line and take the checkered flag!
161420.name: Monster Truck Mayhem

161421.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II

videogameseries.25326: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing

videogamecompilation.187892: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut

161421.description:
User Summary

Van Helsing returns to face new foes with the help of his ghostly companion, Lady Katarina.

161422.name: Voltar's Chapel
161422.description:
From publisher blurb:

Decades ago a small but influential cult controlled a small area around the Dwarven holdings of Agar. For unknown reasons this cult died out and the shrine was lost to the sands of time. Recently the local thane has received reports that there has been renewed activity in the area and a gathering of humanoids in the area. While the thane’s men have fought bravely they were no match for this group and the call has gone out for brave adventurers to assist with the problem. While your party is young you do have an adventure or two under your belts and this may be the challenge to make you famous….if you can handle it.

This adventure setting was designed for 1st/2nd Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign for a low level adventurers and DM. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system. Save yourself some time and utilize it for a one shot adventure or a continuing campaign! This adventure is part of my original campaign decades ago so it isn’t as polished as current work but still quite entertaining!

161423.name: Familiar
161423.description:
From publisher blurb:

Where? Behind the Rabbit!?

Wizards often have arcane beasts as their allies and with the Familiar, a new 8-level class for Labyrinth Lord (and other old-school fantasy role-playing games), you'll be able to take up the role of these often underestimated adventuring companions! With keen senses and uncanny tricks you'll be more than just a four-pawed sidekick!

161424.name: Libreville: Corruption in the Core Worlds
161424.description:
From publisher blurb:

Libreville is the heart of Earth’s multi-world civilisation. With the base of the Beanstalk located inside the mega-city it links humanity to the far-flung colonies. It is home to largest maritime port complex on Earth, and air and spaceports dot the nearby Gabon countryside. It is also a corporate haven as every major commercial enterprise and foundation on Earth has an office in Libreville. Residential enclaves for the elite surround a city core of luxurious excess.

However, Libreville, like all the cities in French Africa, is also ringed by kilometres of slums. While France is happy to accommodate the Transnational Corporations that wish to utilise the Beanstalk, the millions of unemployed and low-skilled workers have yet to see their conditions improve.

Libreville: Corruption in the Core Worlds is a sourcebook and adventure for 2300AD. It outlines the history and geography of Gabon and Central Africa along with the culture, fringe societies and seedy politics of Libreville. The adventure, Mud Sticks, takes the players through the cosmopolitan downtown into desperate Mudville as they investigate an outbreak of violence in the slums. This book also includes sample vehicles, spaceships, robots, non-players and random encounters relevant to Libreville.

While this book is designed for the 2300AD setting, it is easily adapted for any Mongoose Traveller game featuring a futuristic urban setting.

161429.description:
In Who Stole the Cookie? you need to figure out who has both of your cookies because just one is never enough!

To set up, shuffle 2-3 cookie cards with 6-15 crumb cards depending on the number of players, then place two cards in the center of the table and deal two cards to each player, with everyone being able to peek at only one of their cards. On a turn, a player can:


Peek: Look at any one face-down card.
Switch: Switch the position of any two cards.
Shuffle: Have someone shuffle the two cards in front of you, then look at one of them.
Declare: Declare you know where two cookies are, choosing a card that you have or a card in the center of the table only if you can choose both of them. Secretly look at those cards, winning if you're correct and getting removed from the game if you're not. Find the cookies and you win!
161429.name: Who Stole the Cookie?

161431.name: Anima: Gate of Memories

videogamehonor.37566: 2014 AzPlay Awards Best Game Design Nominee

161431.description:
User Summary

Anima: Gate of Memories is based on the series of roleplaying books called Anima: Beyond Fantasy and a direct sequel to Anima: Ark of Sinners. It has a lengthy story, filled with choices that will influence a player’s game over time, a skill tree to allow players to customize the fighting style according to their own play style, as well as featuring puzzles and the ability to play stealthily.

161432.name: The Meridian Shard
161432.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – VAPORWARE




This game is stuck in the development limbo known as Vaporware. Few to no details have been released about about its gameplay, plot, or release date since its announcement many years ago. It may or may not be in active development, but neither has it been cancelled officially.




User Summary

In the Hydra Ranges above the Ashen Plains, an ancient temple shelters the realm’s most masterful healers; a mysterious and reclusive clan of white witches known as Dularian. When all 49 soldiers and prisoners of a remote military mining encampment are found dead without any obvious wounds, the shocking discovery sparks fears of a rising new plague.

161433.name: Knights of the Dinner Table Magazine (Issue 209 - 2014)
161433.description:
"Will you walk into my parlour?"

Cover by Jim Wampler.

161434.description: The whole of the Shackles is thrust into danger by a dastardly invasion plan. You’ll need to pull out all the stops to rally the defense of your home. Discover the betrayal behind the impending invasion with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: The Price of Infamy Adventure Deck. This 110-card expansion to the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game includes new locations, monsters, villains, and more, as well as rare loot cards and 5 new scenarios that make up the complete Price of Infamy adventure. Continue your character’s legend with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: The Price of Infamy Adventure Deck.
161434.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles Adventure Deck 5 – The Price of Infamy

151007.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles – Base Set

161435.description: Bring your troubadour to any tavern with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Bard Deck. Explore four different bard characters in this 109-card set, from Lem the magic researcher to Siwar the information broker. The Bard Deck features diverse new allies, weapons, spells, and other loot to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Play on!
161435.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Bard

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161436.name: The Dragons of Britain (Issue 3 - Summer 2014)
161436.description: User Summary: 'The Dragons of Britain' is a free e-zine dedicated to roleplaying in Arthurian Britain. It features articles, adventures, adventure seeds, and more for King Arthur Pendragon & Age of Arthur.

161437.description: Take your cleric to temples at home and abroad with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Cleric Deck! Explore four different cleric archetypes in this 109-card set, from Kyra the healer to Heggal the carouser. The Cleric Deck boasts new spells, items, and other loot to take your character from the beginning to end of any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Pray on!
161437.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Cleric

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161438.description: Like fighters? You’ll love the new Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Fighter Deck. Explore four different fighter archetypes in this 109-card set, from magic-dabbling Flenta to fun-loving Valeros. The Fighter Deck boasts new weapons, allies, and other cards to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Fight on!
161438.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Fighter

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161439.description: Range far and wide with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Ranger Deck! Explore four different ranger archetypes in this 109-card set, from mage-hating Arabundi to keen-eyed Harsk. The Ranger Deck is packed with new animal allies, weapons, spells, and other goodies to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Hunt on!
161439.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Ranger

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161440.description: Tumble and stab to your heart’s content with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Rogue Deck. Explore four different rogue archetypes in this 109-card set, from stealthy Merisiel to poisonous Wu Shen. The Rogue Deck is packed with new poisons, weapons, and other goodies to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Sneak on!
161440.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Rogue

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161441.description: Chaos and order battle for supremacy in the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Sorcerer Deck! Explore four different sorcerer archetypes in this 109-card set, from master mesmerist Qualzar to tattooed mystic Seoni. The Sorcerer Deck is chock full of new spells, allies, and other loot to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Blast on!
161441.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Sorcerer

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161442.description: Weave mighty magics with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Wizard Deck! Explore four different wizard archetypes in this 109-card set, from necromancer Darago to battle-hardened Ezren. The Wizard Deck contains new items, allies, spells, and other loot to take your character all the way through any Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Base Set or Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign. Weave on!
161442.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Wizard

187687.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy's Mask – Base Set

161444.name: Keep on humming
161444.description: Party game where players have to guess which song is being hummed. Part of a series of games published by John Lewis and Ginger Fox Ltd.

161446.name: Colonial Times (Issue 5 - Summer 2014)
161446.description:
From publisher's blurb.

Colonial Times is the magazine for the 2300AD RPG. Issue 5 contains gun listings, vehicles, the end of the Operation Back Door campaign, and more.

161447.name: Happy Wars
161447.description:
Happy Wars is a multiplayer online game, defined as a role-playing strategy game, although it also has a short story-driven single player campaign mode. The multiplayer mode consists of two teams of up to 15 players attempting to destroy the other team's castle while also defending their own.

The players choose from one of three classes: the warrior, the mage, and the cleric. There are also subclasses, although the only ones implemented at the moment is the Warrior-type Berserker as well as the Mage-type Zephyr and the Cleric-type Engineer.

Source: Wikipedia, "Happy Wars", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161448.name: Ecks vs Sever
161448.description:
Ecks vs. Sever is a first-person shooter (FPS) video game for the Game Boy Advance handheld game console. It was developed by Crawfish Interactive. Based on an early script of the film Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever, it is the first video game developed and released before the film it is based on had begun production. It is followed by the sequel Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever, which having been released after the film, follows it more closely than the first game.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ecks vs. Sever", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

161449.name: m&m's Blast!
161449.description:
User Summary

M&M's Blast is a party game similar to games like "Mario Party" where players advance on a board game track by winning various mini-games.

161450.name: Hole in the Wall
161450.description:
User Summary
Hole In The Wall is a video game adaptation of the TV gameshow of the same name. Players try to make shapes with their bodies to fit within literally, a hole in a wall. The games uses the Kinect to simulate player's locations to a digital approaching wall.

161451.name: Rhythm Party
161451.description:
User Description
Rhythm Party is a music rhythm game that is a spin-off of Dance Evolution. The game is played using the Kinect sensor to mostly electronic music.

161454.name: Risen from the Sands
161454.description:
From back cover

The deserts of Osirion - land of pharaohs and ancient tombs - hide not just untold wonders, but also unspeakable dangers. When the vast sand dunes part to reveal the ancient pyramid of the legendary Pharaoh of Sphinxes, glory seekers from across many nations race towars it, each fighting to be the first to claim its wonders.

Risen from the Sands is a dungeon-based adventure for four 3rd-level characters.

161455.description:
A monopoly (from Greek monos μόνος (alone or single) + polein πωλεῖν (to sell)) exists when a specific person or enterprise is the only supplier of a particular commodity.

Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other (fancy) elements of the Great Canadian Gaming Cooperation.
161455.name: Monopoly: Great Canadian Gaming Cooperation

161456.name: The Continuance Contingency
161456.description:
User summary:

The Continuance Contingency is a quickstart guide for Catalyst Game Labs' Cosmic Patrol. It is made for the 2014 Free RPG Day.

From the back of the book:

ROCKETS AND RAYGUNS

In Cosmic Patrol, players take the role of Patrolmen - the first and last line of defense for humans in a dangerous galaxy. Patrolmen explore, discover and defend the interest of humans wherever they go. With an atomic ray gun at their hip, they brave the unknown on a regular basis

Cosmic Patrol is a rules-light RPG by Catalyst Game Labs that is all about creating a story. Using Cues as building blocks, you will construct a plot and narrate your Patrolman's way through the millions of threats the cosmos has to offer. Your adventure will be unique to you and your group, and you're encouraged to write those adventures up in true pulp style, for all the world to enjoy.

161457.name: The Doom-Cave of the Crystal-Headed Children
161457.description:
User summary

"A strange little adventure of large comic entanglement," The Doom-Cave is James Raggi's offering for Free RPG Day 2014. After complaints that the previous year's scenario was about "killing children," he decided that this year's adventure "should be about the killing of children."

From back cover

"Not to worry though - they are freaky crystal-headed children. Inhuman RPG canon-fodder 'Monsters.' So it's okay. They deserve it. So you can have fun carving them up. Right?"

161458.name: A Druid's Lament
161458.description:
From publisher blurb:

A few decades gone a young half-elf woman named Aspasia ventured into the the Minnimar. Born to her elven mother and raised among the fey folk, Aspasia had love and respect for the sylvan land. Her grandmother had lived in the Minnimar centuries before and Aspasia traveled here to reconnect with her ancestral home. So it was for a great while, and she lived in peace. She spoke to the wild like no other, and traveled with a stag who bore a crown of horns.

But in time, men came and they built homes as men do, and for their homes they cut trees. And they feasted as men do, and for their feasts they hunted the wild game. Thus it was that Aspasia found the men one eve feasting upon the Stag and she cursed them and she called on the forest gods to bring them death and ruin. And thus it was, for the wood’s ancient powers rose to her druidic call, and her rage summoned ruin slew the men. But to her dismay the spirit remained, refusing her calls of banishment, so it was that the Minnimar became a cursed wood, for both fair and foul.

And the call goes out for stalwart adventurers, to bring relief from Minnimar’s sufferance.

161459.name: Make Your Own Luck
161459.description:
From back cover

This introduction to the game includes pre-generated characters, a quick summary of the rules, and a full adventure for a GM and 3-6 players. You don't need the 13th Age rulebook to play.

The town of Harrowdale holds a treasure. An army of trolls wants that treasure. You must hold the town until the Imperial dragon cavalry arrives.

You're outnumbered and your forces are outmatched - and to cap it all off, they've got a secret weapon set to bring doom down upon you.

Relying on the old ways - on nothing but a strong sword and a lucky blow - won’t help you now.

Time to make your own luck.

161460.name: Dungeon Crawl Classics Maximum Xcrawl Free RPG Day

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

161460.description:
From introduction

Seeking the favor of a powerful wizard, the party agrees to steal an artifact from a rival's sanctum. The wizard requires, however, that PCs "feed" the artifact lawful blood to imprison its contents. Both wizard and party are being manipulated by a bored mischievous quasit who desperately wants a change in scenery ...

This adventure is designed for 7-9 first level characters.

From the publisher's website:

This year’s Free RPG Day release from Goodman Games has two great adventures inside:

For DCC RPG, this year’s module features Elzemon and the Blood-Drinking Box, a level 1 adventure by Terry Olson. Seeking the favor of a powerful wizard, the party agrees to steal an artifact from a rival’s sanctum. The wizard requires, however, that PCs “feed” the artifact lawful blood to imprison its contents!

For Maximum Xcrawl, this year’s module features Dungeon Detonation, a level 6-8 adventure (Division II, full lethal) by Brendan LaSalle. Tis another ultra fun challenge designed to make your players cry for mercy and laugh out loud in the same breath! Strap on your armor, cue your theme music, call your agent, and tell them to arrange you a date for the Grammies. It’s time for victory and your own line of action figures… or death. Or worse: calling your old boss and seeing if they still need someone to work lunch shift at the expo.

161461.name: Pathfinder Map Pack: Dungeon Rooms
161461.description:
From the back of the back:

Chambers of Mystery

Ancient halls whisper of the lost past, and only the bravest dare to seek their buried secrets! Pazio Publishing's latest Pathfinder Map Pack provides simple and elegant tools for the busy Game Master. These 5" x 8" map tiles can be positioned to form a variety of ominous dungeon rooms, or combined with tiles from Pathfinder Map Pack: Dungeon Corridors and Pathfinder Map Pack: Dungeon Dangers to create an enormous megadungeon. Inside you'll find 18 richly illustrated map tiles, including:

- Battle-Scarred Hall
- Columned Corder
- Columned Vault
- Crumbling Corner
- Ruined Chamber
- Side Gallery

Game Masters shouldn't waste their time sketching maps every time characters step into a dusty subterranean hall. With Pathfinder Map Pack: Dungeon Rooms, you'll alwasy be ready no matter which way your adventurers turn!

161462.name: Pathfinder Map Pack: Cave Tunnels
161462.description:
From the back of the back:

Dig Deeper

Des the darkness cloaking these twisting passageways hide ancient treasure or unimaginable horror? Paizo Publishing's latest Pathfinder Map Pack provides simple and elegant tools for the busy Game Master. These 5" x 8" map tiles can be positioned to form a variety of mysterious underground tunnels, or combined with tiles from Pathfinder Map Pack: Cave Chambers to create an enormous earthen complex. Inside you'll find 18 richly illustrated map tiles, including:

- Cavernous Maw
- Weathered Stairs
- Buried Crossroads
- Underground Stream
- Subterranean Grotto
- Hidden Entrance

Game Masters shouldn't waste their time sketching maps every time characters step into a gloom-haunted cave mouth. With Pathfinder Map Pack: Cave Tunnels, you'll always be ready no matter which way your adventurers turn!

161463.name: Valiant Universe RPG Quick Start Rules: Experience the Harbinger Wars

rpghonor.27865: 2015 ENnie for Best Electronic Book - Nominee

161463.description:
From back cover

The edge between superhero and villain has never been sharper. In the Valiant Universe RPG, players will immerse themselves in a dark and gritty world where every mission and every battle has deadly consequences. Whether playing X-O Manowar, Bloodshot, Shadowman or even the all-powerful Toyo Harada—or any of dozens of characters—Valiant’s most fearless heroes will unite for the first time in a roleplaying game, allowing you to join their stories and create new ones!

Whether you’re a longtime fan or brand new to the Valiant Universe, this is the only source you’ll need to bring Valiant’s leading characters to life in a fantastic superheroes setting!

161464.name: The Godsfall
161464.description:
User summary

A preview of the Godsfall RPG made available for Free RPG Day 2014. Includes an overview of the game mechanics, pre-generated characters, and a scenario: The Thieves of Eagle Rock.

161465.name: Legend Of Dungeon
161465.description:
You and up to three companions are looking for treasure and glory in a dark flickering dungeon full of deadly. Legend has it there is a massive treasure all the way down on the 26th floor. Your quest: get the treasure, and make it back alive. Which you won't, you'll die...

...the game is about dying, and treasure!

Legend of Dungeon is a randomly generated action RPG Beat'em'up with heavy Rogue-like elements, striking visuals, and dynamic music.

1 to 4 Player Cooperative Gameplay (same PC, multiple controllers)
Randomized Dungeon
Controller support
Real-Time Beat'em'up style combat
Permadeath (with 2+ players, you become a ghost, and collect spirit orbs to resurrect)
Randomized Dynamic Music built from 244 tracks
Dynamically Shaded Pixel Art!
Real-Time Shadows
Online Score Board
Awesome Weapons and Magic!
Creepy Monsters and Bosses

Source: The Developer Website.

161466.name: Antisquad
161466.description:
Widely known in small circles as AntiSquad, they are a military tactical response unit. These hardened military professionals, tired of bureaucracy, politics and serving the armed forces, have established a private paramilitary formation located in south United States. Being true military professionals, they periodically execute contracts for jobs that may not be considered “clean”.

The Team consists of many complex individuals with their own back story, but they do not shun mercenary applicants. Members of the team are idealists; they dwell on moral issues, as well as question blind nationalism, etc. AntiSquad strongly differ from military units. They truly are a bunch of contradictions put together - heartfelt cynics, gregarious egoists, aggressive pacifists, and phlegmatic rebels all under one banner.

Source: The Game Website.

161467.name: Alpha Kimori: Episode One
161467.description:
Alpha Kimori™ 1 is the first in a trilogy of cute, bright, and colorful Japanese Anime inspired episodic casual 2D Role Playing Games, which feature an intricate action-adventure epic story with a delightful mix of sci-fi and fantasy elements.

Source: The Game Website.

161468.name: Journey of a Roach
161468.description:
“Journey of a Roach” is a humorous comic style adventure game, in which you play a giant roach.

Accompany Jim, a naive and good-hearted roach, on his journey through an old, post apocalyptic bunker, in a world where the humans became extinct by a nuclear war. Journey of a Roach is an adventure with a focus on exploring the maze-like world around you. Find your way along by walking on walls and ceilings, collecting items and skillfully combining them. Solving humorous riddles unlocks more and more rooms and episodes.

Source: The Developer Website.

161469.name: Mechanic Escape
161469.description:
In a world oppressed by the machines, a small TV screensbastion resists the persecution. Your lost friends and the lack of resources will push you to react against the extinction.

Brave the dangers and go repair the energy sources in order to rescue your species!

FEATURES:
. A challenge for the experienced players
. A surprising universe of in-depth themes
. Breath-taking game circumstances
. A Gameplay of high pressure

Source: The Developer Website.

161470.name: Alcarys Complex
161470.description:
Corvallis Unruh is a young pacifist from a small coastal town. He spends his days working for the local pharmaceutical distributor and taking his daily pain medication, even though he’s not sure he’s actually in pain.

One night, his world is upended when a huge creature tears his family’s house apart, sending him on an adventure that he’s pretty sure he doesn’t want to be on with a companion who he’s pretty sure doesn’t want him there. Along the way, his companion, Angela, brings other people into the fold – a mercenary, a professional adventurer, a nobleman, and a sorcerer – but Corvallis is always alone. And he knows it.

People who want to curry favor with Corvallis tell him that he’s some sort of Chosen One, but they fail, every time, to tell him that he’s been chosen to be a cog in a political machine with a thirst for profit. And where there is no money, there is only bloodletting.

Enjoy a main narrative about the nature of power and violence. This narrative strongly relies on characterization to govern the main characters’ interactions with each other.
View the perspectives of six well-defined characters with strengths and flaws that reflect their upbringing and experience.
The story doesn’t stop when the cutscene ends! Real-time banter and informed, ever changing non-player characters (NPCs) add to Elcaea’s atmosphere and ensure that you’ll never go uninformed.
Use the Sociability system to gain strength by interacting with those around you and progressing through the main narrative. You’ll be rewarded for knowledge about the personalities of your party members!

Source: The Developer Website.

161471.name: Nekro
161471.description:
UNRELEASED GAME - CANCELLED




This game was cancelled in development.




Nekro challenges you, a once powerful Alchemist, to destroy the King who betrayed you. As you seek vengeance, you turn to the dark powers of the world, transforming yourself into a Necromancer, raiser of the dead. Summoning an undead army, you march towards the King’s castle, letting nothing stand in your way.

Playing with the speed and fluidity of an old-school action game, Nekro promises an intense and captivating gameplay experience from start to finish. Use different minions in unison to create a force that’s greater than the sum of its parts. Utilize a unique blood mechanic to harvest the flesh of your enemies as you power your undead war machine.

Create unholy armies using the corpses of your enemy!
Blood permanently stains the battlefield; body parts squish, bounce, and roll!
Upgrade your minions to create the perfect ‘monster loadout’!
Equip powerful armors that literally change the playstyle of the game!
Dozens of abilities, enemies, monsters and powers!
A randomized world event system throws exciting twists into each match!
3 unique factions to conquer or enslave!

Source: The Publisher Website.

161472.name: Spate
161472.description:
